title: When development and / or redevelopment of any tract of land which includes division and sub-division or amalgamation of plots for various land uses is proposed
clause_text: When development and / or redevelopment of any tract of land which includes division and sub-division or amalgamation of plots for various land uses is proposed. When group housing scheme or campus / cluster planning of any use is proposed.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: When development and / or redevelopment of any tract of land which includes division and sub-division or amalgamation of plots for various land uses is proposed.
